HEBREW: וְאִ֨ישׁ יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל רָאוּ֙ כִּ֣י צַר־ל֔וֹ כִּ֥י נִגַּ֖שׂ הָעָ֑ם וַיִּֽתְחַבְּא֣וּ הָעָ֗ם בַּמְּעָר֤וֹת וּבַֽחֲוָחִים֙ וּבַסְּלָעִ֔ים וּבַצְּרִחִ֖ים וּבַבֹּרֽוֹת׃
ENGLISH: When the men of Yisra᾽el saw that they were in straits, (for the people were hardpressed,) then the people hid themselves in caves, and in thickets, and in rocks, and in strongholds, and in pits.
